com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std

Class StdCombiningAlgorithmFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.CombiningAlgorithmFactory
      • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.StdCombiningAlgorithmFactory

  • public class StdCombiningAlgorithmFactory
extends CombiningAlgorithmFactory
    StdCombiningAlgorithmFactory extends CombiningAlgorithmFactory to implement a mapping from Identifiers to the standard CombiningAlgorithm implementations.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    car
